data: {"generalSituation":"The weather over Guangdong will be mainly fine tomorrow and warm during the day. A replenishment of the northeast monsoon is expected to reach the coast of southern China on Thursday morning. It will be cloudier with temperatures falling progressively over the region during Christmas holidays. It will be rather cool in the morning, and cold over inland areas. Under the influence of a dry monsoon, the weather will be generally fine over southern China during the weekend to early next week. The temperature difference between day and night will be relatively large over inland areas. A band of clouds will cover the northern part of the South China Sea midweek next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251224","week":"Wednesday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 3 to 4.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy.
